bobberdetector.ponder.detector.text_1: Deployers can be given fishing rods to fish for you
bobberdetector.ponder.detector.text_2: Sadly you wont be able to see the fishing bobber in the water, only the particles
bobberdetector.ponder.detector.text_3: But whenever a bobber is inside itÂ´s range the bobber detector lights up
bobberdetector.ponder.detector.text_4: When a fish is being caught the detector emits a redstone signal
bobberdetector.ponder.detector.text_5: You, will have to figure out how to pickup the items though
